title: New: Mozart’s Sister – Mozart’s Sister
content:
So there’s a whiff of Canadian odd-pop supremo Grimes to Montreal’s Mozart’s Sister, perhaps with an added sense of normality and a smoother edge to it.

Taken from her upcoming Hello EP, released 25 February via Merok Records, this self-titled jam is a fitting introduction to Caila Thompson-Hannant aka Mozart’s Sister, a project she started back in early 2011. Awash with 80’s sugary synths and luxurious vocals, she brings a sound that would otherwise appear dated, into a very slick and modern manner. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
